article.description: Khallid Hart scored a career-high 37 points, including the last five of the second overtime, to lead Marist to an 84-83 victory over Brown on Tuesday night in the Hall of Fame Classic.
article.headline: Hart, Marist beat Brown in 2 overtimes, 84-83
article.linkText: Hart, Marist beat Brown in 2 overtimes, 84-83
article.story: UNCASVILLE, Conn. -- Khallid Hart scored a career-high 37 points, including the last five of the second overtime, to lead Marist to an 84-83 victory over Brown on Tuesday night in the Hall of Fame Classic. Brown led 83-79 with under a minute left when Hart connected for a 3-pointer and, after a Brown turnover, made two free throws with 11 seconds left. Another turnover, Brown's 19th, ended the game. Cedric Kuakumensah had 21 points and 12 rebounds, while Jason Massey added 15 points and 10 rebounds for the Bears (3-7). Steven Spieth added 16 points. Hart scored with 12 seconds left in regulation to complete a 7-0 Marist run over the final 1:25. Hart had a last-second basket erased after the officials reversed themselves and called him for an offensive foul. Marist (4-6) led by six in the first overtime but Tavon Blackmon and JR Hobbie hit 3-pointers to tie it.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
